titleStmt.title: Dr. Stillingfleet's principles of Protestancy cleared, confuted, and retorted And the infallibility of the Roman-Catholick Church asserted; and that the same church alone is the whole Catholick church. In a letter from a Catholick gentleman to a Protestant knight.
titleStmt.author: Warner, John, 1628-1692.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
